title: Lovely two Bedrooms, one bathroom home
posting_body: Don't Walk but Run Into Your Newly Renovated 2 bedroom Apartment
Spring in your New must see 2 Bedroom 1.5 bathroom Apartment located in Smyrna GA.
New updated luxury vinyl flooring, new appliances and furnace, water heater and AC.
Did I mention this apartment has space with over 1100 sq ft, and all you'll need to bring is your furniture to make this a home.
We're still working on making this perfect just for you.
Move in ready Now.
Conveniently located to Belmont Hills Elementary School, and shopping and eats.
